bill.title: Midwifery Care Access and Reimbursement Equity Act of 2009
bill.summary: 2/13/2009--Introduced. Midwifery Care Access and Reimbursement Equity Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of and payment for certified midwife services. (Currently only certified nurse-midwife services are covered.)
